name: tutorial
description: Run Z3 in browser using WebAssembly

scripts.start: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp node_modules/z3-solver/build/z3-built.* dist && parcel
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp node_modules/z3-solver/build/z3-built.* dist && parcel build --public-url=/tutorial

author: ViRb3, Ayanamonr, NikolajBjorner
